name: cycle-http-babylonjs-stampit
description: A demo for Cycle.js framework with HTTP and BabylonJS drivers
author: Murray J Brown <mjb@mjbrown.com>
copyright: Copyright (c) 2016 Murray J Brown; All rights reserved.

scripts.babel: npm run babel:lib && npm run babel:common && npm run babel:app
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:all && npm run webpack
scripts.build:all: npm run build:assets && npm run build:src
scripts.build:assets: npm run build:main && npm run build:html && npm run build:img
scripts.build:css: cpy src/*.css build/ && cpy src/app/*.css build/app/
scripts.build:html: cpy src/*.html build/ && npm run build:css
scripts.build:src: npm run compile && npm run webpack
scripts.build:test: npm run babel:tests && npm run webpack && npm run test
scripts.clean: rimraf build/* && mkdir -p build/app build/lib build/img
scripts.run: npm run build && cd build && python -m SimpleHTTPServer
scripts.tsc: npm run tsc:lib && npm run tsc:app
